description: Decimal expansion of tangent of 54 degrees.
comments: Also the decimal expansion of cotangent of 36 degrees. - _Mohammad K. Azarian_, Jun 30 2013
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: Equals A019863/A019845 = 1/A019934. [_R. J. Mathar_, Jul 26 2010]The largest positive solution of cos(4*arctan(1/x)) = cos(6*arctan(1/x)). - _Thomas Olson_, Oct 03 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
